articles.author: Justin Gamble
articles.title: Black people in redlined neighborhoods face higher risks for heart failure - CNN
articles.description: Black adults living in zip codes historically impacted by redlining have an 8% higher risk of developing heart failure than Black adults in non-redlined areas, a study published Monday in the American Heart Association’s scientific journal Circulation says.

articles.title: NY Fed report finds Americans increasingly facing borrowing headwinds - Reuters
articles.description: Americans are increasingly getting shot down when they seek out loans, new data from the New York Fed, released Monday, said.
articles.content:
